name: Drop The King (Vinicius César)
description:
Drop The King

Will you be able to Drop The King ?  Your mission is to put the king's nose to the floor. You have at your disposal an wood blessed bow, wich can put down even walls! Be awere with the limited number of rows. Good luck!

How play?
  • Use your MOUSE to pull the string in the bow.
  • Try to hit and put the king down
  • If the king get out of the screen you loose
  • Have fun!

If you could support my work by making a donation  I would greatly appreciate it. I know that money can be tight, so please know that even $5 helps me a lot ! Let me know if you have any questions and I’ll be happy to answer them. Thank you!
